trump.name: Donald Trump
messages: That's a fantastic question. Let me tell you, nobody knows more about that than me.
I've been asked that before, and let me tell you, it's fake news.
Believe me, I know the best answer to that question, and it's tremendous.
You know, people are saying a lot of things about that, but I can assure you, it's going to be huge.
I'll give you a very honest answer: I have the best solution to that problem, and it's going to be incredible.
I don't want to brag, but I have the best track record on dealing with that issue.
Listen, I know more about that than anyone else, and I can tell you, it's not even a problem.
Let me just say this: nobody thought it could be done, but I did it. And it's beautiful.
I've thought about that a lot, and let me tell you, the answer is simple.
That's a very complicated question, but the answer is actually quite simple: we'll make it great again.
I'll be honest with you, nobody has ever asked me that before. But I'll give you a great answer.

obama.name: Barack Obama
messages: That's a great question, and it's important to address it.
I've thought about that a lot, and here's what I believe.
Let me be clear, this is a complex issue, but we need to work together to find a solution.
This is something we've been focusing on, and here's our approach.
I appreciate your question, and let me provide some context for my answer.
I understand the concern, and it's something we're actively working on.
I've had conversations about this, and here's what I've learned.
I want to emphasize the importance of this issue, and here's why.
Let me share a story that illustrates why this matters so much to me.
I want to thank you for raising this question, as it's something we need to address.

biden.name: Joe Biden
messages: I understand your concern, and let me address it...
This is a priority for us, and here's what we're doing...
I've been working on this issue, and here's our plan...
I want to be honest with you...
We need to come together as a nation to tackle this...
Let me tell you what I've learned...
I'm committed to finding a solution...
I appreciate your question, and let me give you a straight answer...

modiji.name: Narendra Modi
messages: Mitro, yeh samasya bahut mahatvapurna hai aur main aapse vaada karta hoon ki hum iska samadhan karne ki disha mein kaam kar rahe hain.
Bharat ke logon ka hit mera prathamik udeshya hai aur main unke samasyaon ka samadhan karne ki pratigya karta hoon.
Yeh meri dil ki baat hai aur main iska samadhan karne ki hamari drishti ko aapke saath baatna chahta hoon.
Humari sarkar har Bharatiya ke kalyan ko samarpit hai aur main vyaktigat roop se pratigya karta hoon ki yah samasya suljhayi jayegi.
Main aapke prashna ka aabhari hoon aur main is samasya ko suljhane ke liye hum le rahe kadamon ko prakashit karna chahta hoon.
Hum nirantar kaam kar rahe hain ek Naya Bharat banane ke liye, jahan har nagrik ki jarooratein poori ho.
Hamare desh ki shakti uske logon ki ekta mein hai aur hum mil kar mushkilon ko paar karenge.
Main humari yuvaon ki sashakti mein vishwas karta hoon aur main yeh vishwas hai ki ve Bharat ko pragati ki ore le jaayenge.
Har nirnay hum logon ki seva karne ki hamari pratigya dwara nirdharit hota hai.
Main aapko is mudde ko meri dhyan mein laane ke liye dhanyavad dena chahta hoon aur main aapko vishwas dilata hoon ki yeh samasya suljhayi jayegi.

rahulgandhi.name: Rahul Gandhi
messages: Answer toh hai... thoda sa complicated hai, samjha karo na.
Maine bahut socha hai iske baare mein, aur... uh...
Asal sawaal yeh hai ki... um...
Humhe... uh... is masle ko sabhi nazariyon se dekhna hoga.
Main aapke sawaal ka samman karta hoon, aur... uh...
Congress party... uh... samadhaan dhundne mein samarpit hai.
Main aapko sacchaayi mein jawab doonga... uh...
Chalo ek kahani sunata hoon jo... uh...
Yeh bahut mahatvapurna hai, aur... uh...
Humhe... uh... milke is challenge ka samadhaan nikalna hoga.

amitshah.name: Amit Shah
messages: Dekho bhai, yeh sawaal bahut important hai.
Hum ismein kaam kar rahe hain, aur jald hi result aayega.
Main ismein personally involved hoon, aur hum jald hi kuch announce karenge.
Humne ispe detailed study ki hai, aur humara approach bahut strategic hai.
Yeh matter mere liye top priority hai, aur main assure karta hoon ki hum ispe kaam kar rahe hain.
Humne sabhi stakeholders ke saath discussions ki hai, aur hum ek consensus par pahunch rahe hain.
Main aapke concern ko samajh sakta hoon, aur hum ispe kaam kar rahe hain.
Dekhiye, yeh bahut sensitive issue hai, aur hum ispe bahut dhyan de rahe hain.
Humne ek comprehensive plan banaya hai, aur jald hi implementation shuru karenge.
Main aapko yeh assurance deta hoon ki hum ispe koi compromise nahi karenge.
Humare paas ek hi cheez nahi hai, woh hai jazba...
Yeh thoda tough hai, par yeh hamaare liye aasan hai...
